data.text:
July 17, 2024

New Legend: Imugi, New Experimental Gadget, & Ranked Map Pools â Patch 8.11

Introducing, Imugi â the Warrior Chef whoâs ready to cook up a real feast! ð²Â

Over his century-long quest to become a true dragon, Imugi traveled with many companions, including his good pal Jaeyun! Whether slicing foes or ingredients for dinner, the blades of Imugiâs Greatsword & Axe always strike true.Â

Patch 8.11 also brings a new Experimental Gadget: Bubble Bomb, more Esports Items available in Mallhalla, and a new Ranked Map pool. Also starting Friday the 26th, there will be a new Kung Fu Panda Crossover Avatar featuring Zhen and a weekend of discounts on all previous Brawlhalla x Kung Fu Panda Crossover Items!

All this, plus Bug Fixes, Game Improvements, new rewards for Twitch drops, and so much more! Read on to find out about all the new content.Â

To catch the latest Brawlhalla news and content, be sure to follow us on Twitch, TikTok, Discord, YouTube, Reddit, X, Instagram, and Facebook!

Imugi â âThe Warrior Chefâ

Weapons: Axe, Greatsword

Stats: 8 Strength, 8 Defense, 3 Dexterity, 3 Speed

âRewarded for both his successful transformation and culinary achievements, Imugi was taken to Valhalla. He was delighted to see his closest companion and brother-in-arms, Jaeyun. He loves to serve his hungriest pals Xull and Mako, though the annual hot dog eating contest was eventually called a draw after running out of hot dogs, buns, and patience.â

New Skins

Ship Sinker Imugi â Rising from the depths of the ocean, he’ll sink your geobukseon!

Axe: Abandoned Anchor

Greatsword: Crowd Control

Mecha Imugi â Computer chips with dip and a food processor.

Axe: Ultra Slicer

Greatsword: Super Dragon Star Blade

Exoshell Imugi – Bones make for good soup AND armor! Just… different ones.

Axe: Calcium Cleaver

Greatsword: Fear the Femur

Introducing additional cosmetics into Mallhalla, including a new Emoji Skin featuring Imugi, and some Items previously only available as Twitch viewership rewards!

Emoji

Imugi Wow â âWhat did I win? I hope itâs tasty!â

Sidekick

Malefic Grasp â A heinous fiend ready to aid in battle.

Emote

Mammoth Ride â Insert 1 Gold for a ride!

Weapon Skins

Great Pop (Greatsword) – Nothinâ beats a cold ice pop on a hot day!

Clamshell Grasp (Gauntlets) – A nice punch in the sun.

Try out the newest Gadget in Experimental 1v1 & Custom Games with Test Features enabled..

Inspired by the Bubble Tag Mode, throw this new Gadget at an opponent to trap them in a pink bubble!

If the Gadget is thrown and hits a player, they are bubbled for 3 to 4 seconds.

On a non-direct hit, there is a small explosion radius that bubbles players for 2.5 seconds.

The bubble pops if they are hit by an attack or tagged by a teammate.

If attacked, theyâll take 1.5x damage and knockback.

If the gadget misses and hits a wall or platform, it “pops” and disappears instead of bouncing and being reusable.

Please make sure to continue giving us your feedback on this and other Test Features on Discord, X, Reddit, or any of our other official social channels!

Patch 8.11 introduces new Map Pools specifically for Ranked 1v1 & 2v2s. Weâve also added Mustafar and Crumbled Chasm to the Casual 1v1 pool.Â

Check out all the Maps in the new Ranked pools and the updated 1v1 pool below!

Join the brawl and compete for prizes in the next PLAYDAYS tournament presented by Logitech!

Sign up today at Discord.gg/LogitechG

Skadoosh! Starting July 26th, weâre celebrating Kung Fu Panda with a new Zhen Avatar, while also featuring all previous Kung Fu Panda Crossover Items at a discounted price for the weekend.

The Zhen Avatar will join Mallhalla permanently on Friday, July 26th.

Discounts begin at 5am ET on July 26th and run until 4:59 am ET on July 29th.

Discounted Items include:

Po Epic Crossover â âThere is no secret ingredient. Itâs just you.â

An ultimate lover of Kung Fu, this chosen Dragon Warrior is ready to fight and protect with Crane and Mantis by his side.

Tigress Epic Crossover â âThe hardcore do understand, but I canât watch my friend be killed.â

This loyal and powerful warrior is ready to strike with the help of Monkey and Viper

Tai Lung Epic Crossover â âFinally! A worthy opponent. Our battle will be LEGENDARY!â

Breaking free of his chains, Tai Lung with his Chi Stopper and Chorh-Gom Cuffs is eager to battle the mightiest warriors in Valhalla.

Master Shifu KO Effect

âThere is now a Level Zero.â

Help your opponents find inner peace with this KO Effect!

DreamWorks Kung Fu Panda Â© 2021-2024 DreamWorks Animation LLC. All Rights Reserved.

Can we get a â1â in the chat if yâall like codes?Â

ð¥ð® Diffensive: 1

Tune into upcoming Official Tournament Twitch streams to earn Viewership Rewards and Twitch Drops galore! These include some of our favorite in-game Titles that weâve ever cooked up.

Trial of Skuld Viewership Rewards

Hardlight Bow Weapon Skin

âYou May Call Meâ¦â Title

Twitch Drops (Tournaments)

âUnstoppableâ Title

âKnowledge is Powerâ Title

Ghost Brawl is back! Quickly go invisible when you donât use any powers in this tense game mode. If you stay invisible too long or use any power (including dodge), then youâll be visible once more!Â (Pro Tip: dust clouds from jumps and dashes are still visible even when an opponent is not.)

1v1

3 Stocks

200% Damage

8 Minute Timer

Gameplay

Adjusted ball spawn points in Volleybrawl so that certain Signature Attacks won’t be able to hit the ball as it spawns.

Improved Map definitions and Item spawns on several non-competitive Maps including Small Fabled City.

UI

The level 100 gold Legend name reward now has a new font color & glow effect on PC/Mac.

Fixed grammar issues in the descriptions for Volleybrawl 1v1 and Bombsketball 2v2.

Mallhalla

Sorting by âNewâ will now also force discounted & seasonal Items to the front.Â

Owned Items are now always displayed last regardless of sorting options.

UXÂ

Â Online gameplay memory optimizations.

UI

Fixed a bug where friend status would always default to saying âin private custom lobby,â even if they were in a public lobby. Now only displays as âin custom lobbyâ.

Fixed a localization error where the “Competitor’s Badge Tier 31” Avatar said “Competitor’s Badge Tier 3” in Traditional Chinese.

Fixed a bug where the proper names for the Ranked Season 32 Avatars werenât displaying properly.

Gameplay

Fixed several bugs where there were strange interactions when Weapons or Gadgets would spawn right on the active laser gates on the Theed Power Generator Map.

Fixed a bug where the right side soft platform on the Theed Power Generator Map would carry players away just before the blast zone.

UXÂ

Fixed a bug where the social hub would disappear if players got kicked from a Lobby.Â

Fixed a bug where Ranked 2v2 lobbies would not display world rankings.Â

Fixed a console crash in the inventory page when paging through.

Art & Animation

Fixed a bug where the asymmetry on the R2-D2 Sidekick wasnât displaying correctly on the Donât Leave Me Hanginâ and Photo Op Emotes.

Fixed a bug where players were granted certain colors for random Items.Â

Mallhalla

Fixed a bug where players on PC, Mac, and Steamdeck were unable to use a controller to access the search bar.

Fixed a bug where certain Items were appearing in the incorrect store tab.

Fixed a display bug where Items werenât appearing in the purchases tab after re-opening Mallhalla.

Fixed a bug where the Black and White Color Schemes didnât appear immediately in Mallhalla after hitting level 25/10.

Fixed a bug where tiles that bring players to Mallhalla would highlight the wrong store tabs.

The free-to-play Legend rotation for this week features: Thatch, Mirage, Zariel, Thor, Red Raptor, Sidra, Ulgrim, Mako, and Seven.

Thatch â The tournament is a paradise of chaos and fire for this Madman of Barbados as he brandishes Sword and Blasters.

Mirage â An occultist, martial artist, and spy, this agent uses the powers of magic and time-travel along with her Scythe and Spear to take down her foes.

Zariel â The Celestial, a warrior deity of Holy Justice, who abides in blessed Elysium. They use Gauntlets and Bow to take down both Demon hordes and any warrior participating in the Grand Tournament.

Thor â Finally entering the ring, Thor, God of Thunder, makes his appearance in the Grand Tournament with his trusty Hammer, MjÃ¶lnir, and his powerful Orb.

Red Raptor â Armed with Garudaâs Core Orb and Squadron Strikers Battle Boots, The Last Sentai fights in the Grand Tournament, but hopes for a chance to save the souls of his lost teammates.

Sidra â Known for her legendary and fearless raids, the Corsair Queen is prepared to fight with her Sword and Cannon!

Ulgrim â Equipped with flawless Ivaldi creations, his Axe and Rocket Lance, the legendary blacksmith forges his way into battle!

Mako â The ultimate apex predator from The Sea, Mako, with her Greatsword and Katars, aims to make fish meat out of her opponents in the Grand Tournament.

Seven â The Free Heart Engineer is always building new creations. Her Handcrafted Cannon and a Mega Wrench with a flamethrower attachment give her an edge in the Grand Tournament.
